tool_description: Generates a list of questions and answers from a given text. Generated questions and answers can be used to train chatGPT or to create a questionnaire.
name: AI Based Questions Generator
title: AI Based Questions Generator

api_list.name: Generate Answers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-based-questions-generator.p.rapidapi.com/generate/answer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-based-questions-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Generate Questions
api_list.description: This endpoint generates a list of short questions from a given text.
